    activate() - Method in class net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron
    Computes and caches this neuron's output by: Reading outputs from Neuron.getInputNodes() into an internal buffer, Computing the weighted sum with bias, Applying the NeuronFunction.getActivationFunction(). Subsequent calls are no-ops until Neuron.deactivate() is invoked.

    net.tvburger.jdl - package net.tvburger.jdl
    Welcome to Java Deep Learning!
    net.tvburger.jdl.adaline - package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
    Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
    net.tvburger.jdl.common - package net.tvburger.jdl.common
    Contains classes that are common (can be used well outside the scope of machine learning / AI)
    net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns - package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns
    This package defines annotations for design patterns to help understand the design and function of classes
    net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils - package net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils
    Contains simple classes that are not present in the standard java library
    net.tvburger.jdl.datasets - package net.tvburger.jdl.datasets
    Package to obtain data sets to be used with estimation functions
    net.tvburger.jdl.knn - package net.tvburger.jdl.knn
    Provides the implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors
    net.tvburger.jdl.mlp - package net.tvburger.jdl.mlp
    Implementation of the MultiLayer Perceptron
    net.tvburger.jdl.model - package net.tvburger.jdl.model
    Defines the concepts for estimation functions
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances - package net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances
    Package for distance metrics
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn - package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
    Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training - package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training
    Package to group all the neural network specific training aspects
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers - package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers
    Defines the neural network initialization algorithms
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers - package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers
